name: Legal Eagles
description: Command the courtroom with powerful legal strategies, objections, and witness manipulation

cards.title: Supreme Advocate
cards.description: Master of legal argumentation with an unbeatable track record
cards.imageDescription: Distinguished lawyer in court robes, confidently presenting a compelling case
cards.effect: On summon: draw 2 cards; Passive: +1 card per turn
cards.flavor: Justice is not just blind, it's also brilliant.

cards.title: Objection!
cards.description: A powerful legal objection that disrupts your opponent's strategy
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer dramatically pointing and shouting 'Objection!' in a packed courtroom
cards.effect: Negate the next opponent action, gain 3 MP
cards.flavor: Sustained! Your honor, I object to this entire line of questioning.

cards.title: Key Witness Testimony
cards.description: Call a crucial witness who provides game-changing evidence
cards.imageDescription: Important witness taking the stand and pointing to the defendant
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, opponent discards 2 cards
cards.flavor: The truth will set you free, but first it will blow your case wide open.

cards.title: Rigorous Cross-Examination
cards.description: Tear apart your opponent's case with pointed questions
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer aggressively questioning a nervous witness on the stand
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, then choose 1 card for them to discard
cards.flavor: Every lie has a crack, and I know exactly where to hit.

cards.title: Exploit Legal Loophole
cards.description: Find a technicality that saves you from a losing position
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer studying thick law books, finding a small clause highlighted
cards.effect: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: It's not cheating if it's in the rulebook.

cards.title: Subpoena
cards.description: Force your opponent to reveal their hand
cards.imageDescription: Court officer delivering official legal documents to a surprised person
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: You have the right to remain silent, but I have the right to know what you're hiding.

cards.title: Out-of-Court Settlement
cards.description: Negotiate a favorable deal that benefits both parties
cards.imageDescription: Two lawyers shaking hands across a conference table with documents
cards.effect: Restore 3 HP to all your champions, gain 2 MP
cards.flavor: Sometimes the best victory is the one where everyone wins.

cards.title: Contempt of Court
cards.description: Punish your opponent for unsportsmanlike conduct
cards.imageDescription: Judge angrily pointing at a misbehaving person in the courtroom
cards.effect: Opponent loses 2 MP regeneration this turn, you gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Order in the court! Show some respect for the legal process.

cards.title: Hung Jury
cards.description: A group of jurors who can't reach a verdict, causing delays
cards.imageDescription: Group of diverse jurors in the jury box, looking confused and debating
cards.effect: On summon: All champions lose 1 MP regeneration this turn; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events

cards.title: Private Investigator
cards.description: A skilled detective who uncovers hidden evidence
cards.imageDescription: Private eye in trench coat, examining clues with magnifying glass
cards.effect: When attacking: Look at opponent's hand; Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn
cards.flavor: The truth is out there, and I'm going to find it.

cards.title: Chief Justice
cards.description: The highest judicial authority whose rulings shape the entire legal landscape
cards.imageDescription: Chief Justice in ornate robes, holding gavel with supreme authority in grand courtroom
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: All your cards cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 1 card
cards.flavor: The final word in justice, delivered with absolute authority.
